algorithm: The new algorithm assigns scores to the bins based on the sum of the remaining capacity divided by the item size and multiplied by the maximum remaining capacity divided by the item size, taking the logarithm of the sum as an additional factor.
code:
import numpy as np

def score(item, bins):
    max_capacity = np.max(bins)
    remaining_capacity = max_capacity - bins

    scores = np.log((remaining_capacity / item) * (max_capacity / item) + np.sum(remaining_capacity / item))

    return scores
